name: Hints
description: Cyclically display a hint from a list of hints on an interval to the whole server.
author: x

display-interval.description: How often to display a hint, in seconds.

prefix.description: A prefix placed before all hints to display. If left blank, no prefix will be used.

file.description: The name of the file to read hints from. This is relative to your Omegga installation. Read the README from the GitHub page for more information on how this works.
